meta.description: Optimize the number of medium and large carts to maximize rice transportation given horse constraints.

sets.name: CART_SIZES
sets.description: Types of carts available for transporting rice.

params.name: horses_required
params.description: Number of horses required for each cart size.

params.name: rice_capacity
params.description: Rice carrying capacity in kg for each cart size.

vars.name: num_carts
vars.description: Number of carts of each size to be used.

objective.name: max_rice_transport
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of rice transported.

constraints.name: horse_limit
constraints.description: Total number of horses used cannot exceed available horses.

constraints.name: medium_large_ratio
constraints.description: The number of medium carts must be three times the number of large carts.

constraints.name: min_medium_carts
constraints.description: There must be at least 5 medium sized carts.

constraints.name: min_large_carts
constraints.description: There must be at least 5 large sized carts.
